noun.description: An educational institution or establishment, in particular one providing higher education or specialized professional or vocational training.
examples: I'm at college, studying graphic design
my brother wanted to go to college

noun.description: An organized group of professional people with particular aims, duties, and privileges.

origin: Late Middle English: from Old French, from Latin collegium partnership, from collega partner in office, from col- together with + legare depute.
